display_long_description:
💧 MIXED REALITY UPDATE — NOW LIVE!

Experience Pipe Dream Co in your own room with full hand tracking and fresh quality-of-life upgrades that make fixing leaks smoother than ever!

🚰 A New Kind of Puzzle Madness!

The pipes are bursting.... and only you can stop the flood!
Twist, turn, and snap pipes together as fast as you can to save the day (and your shoes).

From the creator of Crazy Kung Fu and Wordomi, Pipe Dream Co brings fast-paced spatial puzzle action that tests your brain and reflexes in equal measure.
Place pipes strategically, master wild modifiers, and plug every leak before time runs out!

🧰 Features

- 💦 30+ drippingly fun jobs to master!
- 🌀 Wacky pipe types — fast, slow, dirty… even wormholes?!
-🌙 Night Mode — fix leaks in the dark with your trusty flashlight!
- 🎵 Catchy beats to keep you in the flow while you crush the gush!
- 🧠 Progressive promotions — climb the ranks to bigger, trickier pipe disasters!

🌍 Save Water. Save the World.

Join Pipe Dream Co today, and prove you’re the fastest plumber in MR!
